name: Fruits Pair Festival February
description:
All T&M's fruits pairs have gathered in February again!!
Let's play snowball fight for good harvest!!

Nacchan, Nanachan, Miss.Orange show!!
A girl of snow, Yuki, shows too!!

Fight in pairs.
Fight in the heavy snow falling on the highlands of the TREE.

Each characters can launch one small ball, three middle balls and one big ball.
The game modes are Solo, BlueTooth VS, On-Line world VS, and Watch.

SnowBall fight!!!
Only Yuki and Suno launch snow ball, though...
